issue.title: [Python/Documentation] Use sphinx_rtd_theme instead of Bootstrap
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3533](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3533). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have got some feedback that the Arrow Python API documentation is a bit confusing as the ToC/Menu is only really visible on the front page. People get confused by the top header. As we are already diverging from the main homepage as this was migrated to a newer bootstrap version anyway, I suggest to change the documentation theme.

As a best practice, I would switch back to the sphinx_rtd_theme as this provides a UX people are used to and happy with. We can customize it if needed later as e.g. dask did: https://github.com/dask/dask-sphinx-theme
